full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI RIM PA DANG PO'I ZAB KHRID THUN MONG MA YIN PA RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I ZHAL LUNG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG MA KUN GYI GZHUNG LAM SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @109B (CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI RIM PA DANG PO'I, ZAB KHRID THUN MONG MA YIN PA RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I ZHAL LUNG GRUB PA'I DBYUG KUN GYI GZHUNG LAM SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOS ZHES PA 'DI NI, RIGS @110A *, ,DANG DKYIL 'KHOR KUN GYI BDAG PO KUN MKHYEN BLA MA KHRI RIN PO CHE YAB SRAS BZHI SOGS 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BLANGS PA, KHYAD PAR DU RIGS DANG DKYIL 'KHOR KUN GYI BDAG PO RIM GNYIS MTHAR PHYIN PA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG ,RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL GYI ZHABS DRUNG DU CHOS 'DI'I RIM GNYIS KYI NYAMS KHRID ZAB BSHAD DANG, DE'I YAN LAG LA DRUG CU PA CHE CHUNG SBYIN SREG SOGS LAG 'KHRID DU THOB PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG MANG THOS SBYONG BA PA, 'JAM DBYANGS BSHAD PA'I RDO RJES RANG GI BLO LA, JI LTAR NGES PA'I GSUNG RNAMS ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR DU RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
